meanings.definition: To create and post video blogs online.
meanings.sent1: She vlogged about her trip to the zoo.
meanings.sent2: He vlogged his daily routine for his followers.
meanings.sent3: The cat vlogged its adventures in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The students vlogged their science experiment with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The chef vlogged the process of baking a cake step by step.

meanings.sent1: Her vlogged from last week got many views.
meanings.sent2: I watched a funny vlogged about cats on the internet.
meanings.sent3: The old vlogged reminded him of his childhood.
meanings.sent4: The vlogged captured the essence of the music festival.
meanings.sent5: The vlogged brought back memories of the family vacation.
